channel.title: Expendables spin-off
channel.description:
As hopefully you have all noticed The Expendables 2 was recently released to a lukewarm response from critics andcheers and applause from everyone else. Due to the fact that it made vast sums of money (and was actually much better to boot) they are now considering an all female spin-off team. So the question is (assuming that the director takes things at least somewhat seriously) who would you hire to fill the lead roles?
Just a few guidelines however. 1.) No male candidates please 2.) Give an (appropriate) example of their acting career. 3.) Being 'sexy' is not enough... i.e.e NO charlies angels. 4.) Last and hardest to follow, SAY WHY you think such and such are awesome.
So starting things off here are a few of mine.
Gina Carina (Haywire), while she can't act worth shit; none-the-less this MMA master can kick heads in with the best of them as shown spectacularily by 2011s Haywire (another dumb but hopefully fun film).
Yu Nan (Expendables 2), Unlike Carina she is a legitimate actor and as shown in the expendables she can kick ass with the best (Maggie was my favourite supporting expendable)
Maggie Q (Die Hard 4), another genuine actor who can fight she has shined in the TV series Nikita breaking limbs when neccesary but also manipulating others (male and female) like a pro. Awesome
Carrie-anne Moss (The Matrix). The Matrix, what more needs to be said?

item.title: Expendables spin-off
item.dc:creator: Dr_Karamazov
item.description:
You mean this one…

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kayFrIR-Qfw

It is horrendously camp.

item.title: Expendables spin-off
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
Hell, did you see that deleted scene from T3 where Schwarzenegger’s face on the T-800s are explained by the robots being modelled on a soldier? It was the most laughably bad, pointless piece of shit ever. Felt like bad fanfiction, moreso than the film itself.

Read full topic

item.title: Expendables spin-off
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
k3nny1550:

I think the choice in actors was for a couple reasons:

  1. Budgetary reasons

  2. Linda Hamilton’s aged since T1/T2

  3. Helps to firmly establish Chronicles in an alternate continuity, away from the terrible mess that is T3.

Plus, I loved how it dealt with the subject of AI. The second season got really deep.

It was actually getting really good. Too bad there were too many fucknuts who couldn’t see it at face value and bashed it to hell because “HURR DURR IT NOT TURRMURRNURRTURR CURRS DERRS NO ARRNARRD SCHWURRSNIGGER”. Fucking idiots ruining everything. Every fucking time.

Read full topic

item.title: Expendables spin-off
item.dc:creator: Dr_Karamazov
item.description:
Keresh:

They’re all tv show hosts?

You didn’t do an image search? An image search would pretty much explain all.

I am facepalming so hard that I think I’ve just broken my nose.

Read full topic

item.title: Expendables spin-off
item.dc:creator: Comrade_Tiki
item.description:
The Terminator franchise started getting weird with the 3rd movie, and it freaks me out to see a character I’m familiar with be portrayed by an actor/actress which doesn’t resemble the original.

Read full topic

item.title: Expendables spin-off
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
Comrade Tiki:

So, for you to bring up that-that-that… abomination of a “Chronicle”, I say no-- just no.

Why did you hate the Sarah Connor Chronicles? I happened to like that show a great deal, so just wondering.

Read full topic

item.title: Expendables spin-off
item.dc:creator: Dr_Karamazov
item.description:
I nominate Kiera Knightley because of her acting skills…PAH! Sorry, bad joke. My shoe was actually an acting double for Kiera in her new film Anna Karenina. Most of the actual acting parts are performed by my shoe, while Kiera did most of the pouting scenes herself.

item.title: Expendables spin-off
item.dc:creator: Comrade_Tiki
item.description:
You know, all of these pole-armed women seem incapable of supporting an entire action film. I nominate Julie T. Wallace to break the trend.

…

Come to think of it, Milla Jovovich seems like an obvious pick for some film like this, I’m surprised she hasn’t been named yet.

item.title: Expendables spin-off
item.dc:creator: Dr_Karamazov
item.description:
Comrade Tiki:

I don’t know any of those names, and you didn’t even try to help me realize where I could have recognized them from. You have successfully alienated me enough that I don’t even care to google them. I hope you’re happy.

Look up Sabrina Sabrok and you’ll get a fair idea what the rest of them are like.

item.title: Expendables spin-off

item.description:
Honestly I think it should be:

Carrie Ann Moss
Michelle Rodriguez
Uma Thurman
Sigourney Weaver

…and then throw in some other hot chicks (who aren’t necessarily known for action) like Olivia Wilde(tron 2, house), Megan Fox(dur), Mary Elizabeth Winstead(death proof, scott pilgrim)…

Action and sex.
